Name: RISK: Global Domination
About the game: Battle opponents in strategic warfare in the official digital version of the classic Hasbro board game loved by millions. Fight against the Axis Powers in WWI, survive war games against undead zombies and battle on fantasy, futuristic and sci-fi maps. Download RISK Global Domination for free now! - Build an army to clash against your foes! - Use diplomacy to gain allies and fight to the death for blood and honor! - Command your troops on the battlefield! - Engage in glorious combat and all-out war! - Protect your allies & conquer your enemies! - Use strategy to lead your army to victory! - Play with friends! Features: - BATTLE IN REAL-TIME - CLASSIC & CUSTOM RULES - SOLO & MULTIPLAYER GAMES - PLAY 60+ MAPS - COMPETE AGAINST MILLIONS OF PLAYERS - CLIMB THE RANKS TO GRANDMASTER
